p.k: Soloist Malcolm Frager performs Mozart's Piano Concerto No. 5, K 175 and is accompanied by the Orchestra della Radiotelevisione della Svizzera, conducted by Marc Andreae.
p.d: Malcolm Frager performs Mozart's Piano Concerto No. 5, K 175, a work of contrapuntal writing, a style that Mozart perfected under Padre Martini's tutelage. Discover the Orchestra della Radiotelevisione della Svizzera and conducted by Marc Andreae, at the Teatro Bibiena in Mantua.
